mapper.select: SELECT m1.memberIdx, m1.id, m1.pwd, m1.name, m2.birth, m1.nickName, m2.email1, m2.email2, m2.tel1, m2.tel2, m2.tel3, m2.addr1, m2.addr2, m2.gender, m1.category1, m1.category2, m1.category3, m2.age FROM member1 m1 LEFT OUTER JOIN member2 m2 ON m1.memberIdx = m2.memberIdx LEFT OUTER JOIN memberauthority ma ON m1.memberIdx = ma.memberIdx WHERE m1.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE member1 m1 SET m1.nickName = #{nickName}, m1.name = #{name}, m1.category1 = #{category1, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, m1.category2 = #{category2, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, m1.category3 = #{category3, jdbcType=NUMERIC} WHERE m1.id = #{id}

UPDATE member2 m2 SET m2.email1 = #{email1}, m2.email2 = #{email2}, m2.tel1 = #{tel1}, m2.tel2 = #{tel2}, m2.tel3 = #{tel3}, m2.addr1 = #{addr1}, m2.addr2 = #{addr2}, m2.gender = #{gender} WHERE m2.memberIdx = (SELECT m1.memberIdx FROM member1 m1 WHERE m1.id = #{id})
